statements: SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM portfolios WHERE portfolio_value > 10000;
SELECT * FROM portfolios ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM portfolios WHERE portfolio_value < 5000;
SELECT SUM(portfolio_value) AS total_value FROM portfolios;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM portfolios WHERE client_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE portfolio_value > 10000;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value, asset_allocation->'stock' AS stock_allocation FROM portfolios WHERE client_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM portfolios ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH(asset_allocation->'bonds') as num_bonds FROM portfolios WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(asset_allocation, '{"stocks":["Apple"]}');
SELECT * FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Clients;
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, portfolio_value FROM Portfolios;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_phone FROM Clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM Clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_email FROM Clients
SELECT * FROM Clients INNER JOIN Portfolios ON Clients.client_id = Portfolios.client_id
SELECT client_name, portfolio_name, portfolio_value FROM Clients INNER JOIN Portfolios ON Clients.client_id = Portfolios.client_id WHERE portfolio_value > 10000
SELECT client_name, portfolio_name FROM Clients INNER JOIN Portfolios ON Clients.client_id = Portfolios.client_id ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM Clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, portfolio_value FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE portfolio_value > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, SUM(portfolio_value) AS total_portfolio_value FROM ClientPortfolio GROUP BY client_name;
SELECT client_name, transaction_date, amount FROM ClientPortfolio JOIN Transactions ON ClientPortfolio.client_id = Transactions.client_id ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE portfolio_value > 10000 ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, portfolio_value FROM ClientPortfolio WHERE asset_class = 'Stocks' ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;
SELECT client_name, SUM(portfolio_value) AS total_value FROM ClientPortfolio GROUP BY client_name HAVING total_value > 50000;
SELECT ph.client_id, cp.client_name, ph.portfolio_value, ph.date_updated FROM PortfolioHistory ph LEFT JOIN ClientPortfolio cp ON ph.client_id = cp.client_id ORDER BY ph.date_updated DESC;
SELECT t.client_id, t.transaction_date, t.amount, cp.client_name FROM Transactions t JOIN ClientPortfolio cp ON t.client_id = cp.client_id WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Client WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM Client WHERE client_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, quantity FROM Asset WHERE portfolio_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Portfolio WHERE total_value > 10000 ORDER BY total_value ASC;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'Buy' AND transaction_amount >= 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM Client WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_email, client_phone FROM Client ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, quantity FROM Asset WHERE portfolio_id = 3 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Portfolio WHERE total_value > 10000;
SELECT u.username, u.role, t.transaction_amount FROM User u JOIN Transaction t ON u.user_id = t.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_amount < 5000 ORDER BY t.transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Client;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM Client WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, price FROM Asset ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT portfolio_id, SUM(quantity*price) AS total_value FROM Asset GROUP BY portfolio_id HAVING total_value > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Client WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_age FROM Client ORDER BY client_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Asset WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT Portfolio.portfolio_name, Transaction.transaction_type FROM Portfolio JOIN Transaction ON Portfolio.portfolio_id = Transaction.asset_id WHERE Transaction.amount < 0;
SELECT DISTINCT client_name FROM Client WHERE client_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
